<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox?> <?import javafx.scene.control.DatePicker?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableColumn?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Pane?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="704.0" prefWidth="1200.0" stylesheets="@../../css/LapHoaDon.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/25" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.pharmacymanagementsystem_qlht.controller.CN_BanHang.LapHoaDon.LapHoaDon_Ctrl"> <children> <!-- Title --> <Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="21.0" styleClass="title-label" text="LẬP HÓA ĐƠN" />
<!-- Search and Table Area --> <Pane layoutX="40.0" layoutY="73.0" prefHeight="70.0" prefWidth="741.0" styleClass="search-pane"> <children> <TextField fx:id="txtTimKiem" layoutX="310.0" layoutY="21.0" prefHeight="27.0" prefWidth="406.0" promptText="Nhập tên sản phẩm/hoạt chất ..." /> <TextField fx:id="txtMaHoaDon" layoutX="106.0" layoutY="21.0" prefHeight="27.0" prefWidth="88.0" /> <Label layoutX="21.0" layoutY="23.0" text="Mã hóa đơn:"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="13.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label layoutX="229.0" layoutY="26.0" text="Tìm sản phẩm: " /> </children> </Pane>
<!-- Table --> <Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="150.0" styleClass="section-label" text="Chi tiết sản phẩm" /> <TableView fx:id="tblChiTietHoaDon" layoutX="40.0" layoutY="180.0" prefHeight="470.0" prefWidth="741.0" styleClass="main-table"> <columns> <TableColumn prefWidth="50.0" text="STT" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="242.0" text="Tên sản phẩm/Hoạt chất" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="61.0" text="Số lượng" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="64.0" text="Đơn vị" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="103.0" text="Đơn giá" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="88.0" text="Chiết khấu(%)" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="131.0" text="Thành tiền" /> </columns> </TableView>
<!-- Info Panel --> <Pane layoutX="820.0" layoutY="17.0" prefHeight="672.0" prefWidth="368.0" styleClass="info-pane"> <children> <Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="20.0" styleClass="bold-label" text="THÔNG TIN KHÁCH HÀNG" /> <Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="60.0" text="Họ tên khách hàng:" /> <TextField fx:id="txtTenKhachHang" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="54.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="100.0" text="Số điện thoại:" /> <TextField fx:id="txtSoDienThoai" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="94.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="140.0" text="Nhập mã đơn thuốc:" /> <TextField fx:id="txtMaDonThuoc" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="134.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="180.0" text="Bác sĩ kê đơn:" /> <TextField fx:id="txtBacSi" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="174.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="220.0" text="Ngày kê đơn:" /> <DatePicker fx:id="dpNgayKeDon" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="214.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="270.0" text="Tổng chiết khấu:" /> <Label fx:id="lblChietKhauValue" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="270.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="310.0" text="Tổng tiền:" /> <Label fx:id="lblTongTienValue" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="310.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="350.0" text="Thuế (VAT 5%):" /> <Label fx:id="lblVATValue" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="350.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="400.0" styleClass="bold-label" text="Thành tiền:" /> <Label fx:id="lblThanhTienValue" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="400.0" styleClass="main-value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="450.0" text="Phương thức thanh toán:" /> <ChoiceBox fx:id="cbPhuongThucTT" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="444.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="490.0" text="Số tiền khách đưa:" /> <TextField fx:id="txtSoTienKhachDua" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="484.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="530.0" text="Tiền thừa:" /> <Label fx:id="lblTienThuaValue" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="530.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Button fx:id="btnDatHang" layoutX="54.0" layoutY="586.0" prefHeight="44.0" prefWidth="120.0" styleClass="danger-btn" text="In hóa đơn"> <font> <Font size="13.0" /> </font> </Button> <Button fx:id="btnThanhToan" layoutX="194.0" layoutY="586.0" prefHeight="44.0" prefWidth="120.0" styleClass="success-btn" text="Thanh toán"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="13.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </Pane> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.DatePicker?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableColumn?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextArea?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.effect.DropShadow?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Pane?> <?import javafx.scene.paint.Color?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="704.0" prefWidth="1200.0" stylesheets="@../../css/LapPhieuDoiHang.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/25" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.pharmacymanagementsystem_qlht.controller.CN_BanHang.LapPhieuDoiHang.LapPhieuDoiHang_Ctrl"> <children> <!-- Title --> <Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="21.0" styleClass="title-label" text="LẬP PHIẾU ĐỔI HÀNG" />
<!-- Search and Table Area --> <Pane layoutX="37.0" layoutY="70.0" prefHeight="70.0" prefWidth="734.0" styleClass="search-pane"> <children> <Label layoutX="20.0" layoutY="20.0" text="Tìm hóa đơn gốc:"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="13.0" /> </font></Label> <TextField fx:id="txtTimHoaDonGoc" layoutX="140.0" layoutY="15.0" prefHeight="27.0" prefWidth="456.0" promptText="Nhập mã hóa đơn hoặc tên khách hàng ..." /> <Button fx:id="btnTim" layoutX="642.0" layoutY="16.0" prefWidth="60.0" styleClass="primary-btn" text="Tìm" /> </children> </Pane>
<Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="150.0" styleClass="section-label" text="Sản phẩm trong hóa đơn gốc" /> <TableView fx:id="tblSanPhamGoc" layoutX="40.0" layoutY="180.0" prefHeight="180.0" prefWidth="741.0" styleClass="main-table"> <columns> <TableColumn prefWidth="50.0" text="STT" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="242.0" text="Tên sản phẩm" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="57.0" text="Số lượng" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="50.0" text="Đơn vị" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="130.0" text="Đơn giá" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="87.0" text="Chiết khấu(%)" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="123.0" text="Thành tiền" /> </columns> </TableView>
<Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="370.0" styleClass="section-label" text="Chi tiết đổi hàng" /> <TableView fx:id="tblChiTietDoiHang" layoutX="40.0" layoutY="400.0" prefHeight="250.0" prefWidth="741.0" styleClass="main-table"> <columns> <TableColumn prefWidth="50.0" text="STT" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="242.0" text="Tên sản phẩm" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="82.0" text="Số lượng đổi" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="54.0" text="Đơn vị" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="101.0" text="Đơn giá" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="106.0" text="Thành tiền" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="102.0" text="Lý do đổi" /> </columns> </TableView>
<!-- Info Panel --> <Pane layoutX="820.0" layoutY="70.0" prefHeight="571.0" prefWidth="341.0" styleClass="info-pane"> <children> <Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="20.0" styleClass="bold-label" text="THÔNG TIN PHIẾU ĐỔI HÀNG" /> <Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="60.0" text="Mã hóa đơn gốc:" /> <TextField fx:id="txtMaHoaDonGoc" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="54.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="100.0" text="Ngày lập phiếu:" /> <DatePicker fx:id="dpNgayLapPhieu" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="94.0" prefWidth="140.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="140.0" text="Tổng tiền gốc:" /> <Label fx:id="lblTongTienGoc" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="140.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="180.0" text="Tổng tiền đổi hàng:" /> <Label fx:id="lblTongTienDoi" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="180.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="220.0" text="Thuế (VAT):" /> <Label fx:id="lblVAT" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="220.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="270.0" styleClass="bold-label" text="Số tiền trả lại:" /> <Label fx:id="lblTienTraLai" layoutX="170.0" layoutY="270.0" styleClass="main-value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="320.0" text="Ghi chú:" /> <TextArea fx:id="txtGhiChu" layoutX="30.0" layoutY="350.0" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="280.0" />
<Button fx:id="btnDatHang" layoutX="40.0" layoutY="471.0" prefHeight="44.0" prefWidth="120.0" styleClass="danger-btn" text="In phiếu đổi"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> <effect> <DropShadow> <color> <Color red="0.7368420958518982" green="0.668615996837616" blue="0.668615996837616" /> </color> </DropShadow> </effect> </Button> <Button fx:id="btnThanhToan" layoutX="180.0" layoutY="471.0" prefHeight="44.0" prefWidth="120.0" styleClass="success-btn" text="Đổi hàng"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> <effect> <DropShadow> <color> <Color red="0.7368420958518982" green="0.668615996837616" blue="0.668615996837616" /> </color> </DropShadow> </effect> </Button> </children> <effect> <DropShadow> <color> <Color red="0.05263157933950424" green="0.05092592537403107" blue="0.05092592537403107" /> </color> </DropShadow> </effect> </Pane> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableColumn?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextArea?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Pane?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="704.0" prefWidth="1200.0" stylesheets="@../../css/LapPhieuTraHang.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/25" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="/com/example/pharmacymanagementsystem_qlht/controller/CN_BanHang/LapPhieuTra/LapPhieuTraHang_Ctrl"> <children> <!-- Tiêu đề --> <Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="21.0" styleClass="title-label" text="LẬP PHIẾU TRẢ HÀNG" />
<!-- Khu vực tìm kiếm hóa đơn gốc --> <Pane layoutX="30.0" layoutY="70.0" prefHeight="70.0" prefWidth="641.0" styleClass="search-pane"> <children> <Label layoutX="20.0" layoutY="20.0" text="Tìm hóa đơn gốc:"> <font> <Font size="13.0" /> </font></Label> <TextField fx:id="txtTimHoaDon" layoutX="130.0" layoutY="15.0" prefHeight="27.0" prefWidth="391.0" promptText="Nhập mã hóa đơn hoặc tên khách hàng ..." /> <Button fx:id="btnTimHoaDon" layoutX="573.0" layoutY="16.0" styleClass="primary-btn" text="Tìm" /> </children> </Pane>
<!-- Hướng dẫn sử dụng --> <Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="150.0" styleClass="hint-label" text="Chọn hóa đơn gốc để bắt đầu trả hàng" />
<!-- Bảng sản phẩm hóa đơn gốc --> <Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="180.0" styleClass="section-label" text="Sản phẩm trong hóa đơn gốc" /> <TableView fx:id="tblSanPhamHoaDon" layoutX="40.0" layoutY="210.0" prefHeight="200.0" prefWidth="641.0" styleClass="main-table"> <columns> <TableColumn prefWidth="40.0" text="STT" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="180.0" text="Tên sản phẩm" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="80.0" text="Số lượng" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="60.0" text="Đơn vị" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="80.0" text="Đơn giá" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="86.0" text="Chiết khấu" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="110.0" text="Thành tiền" /> </columns> </TableView>
<!-- Bảng chi tiết trả hàng --> <Label layoutX="40.0" layoutY="437.0" styleClass="section-label" text="Chi tiết trả hàng" /> <TableView fx:id="tblChiTietTraHang" layoutX="40.0" layoutY="467.0" prefHeight="183.0" prefWidth="641.0" styleClass="main-table"> <columns> <TableColumn prefWidth="40.0" text="STT" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="180.0" text="Tên sản phẩm" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="80.0" text="Số lượng trả" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="60.0" text="Đơn vị" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="80.0" text="Đơn giá" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="100.0" text="Thành tiền" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="120.0" text="Lý do trả" /> <TableColumn prefWidth="40.0" text="Xóa" /> </columns> </TableView>
<!-- Thông tin phiếu trả và tổng hợp bên phải --> <Pane layoutX="780.0" layoutY="70.0" prefHeight="571.0" prefWidth="391.0" styleClass="info-pane"> <children> <Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="20.0" text="Mã hóa đơn gốc:" /> <TextField fx:id="txtMaHoaDonGoc" editable="false" layoutX="209.0" layoutY="14.0" prefWidth="120.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="60.0" text="Ngày lập hóa đơn:" /> <TextField fx:id="txtNgayLapHoaDon" editable="false" layoutX="209.0" layoutY="54.0" prefWidth="120.0" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="110.0" text="Tổng tiền gốc:" /> <Label fx:id="lblTongTienGoc" layoutX="209.0" layoutY="109.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="150.0" text="Tổng tiền hàng trả lại:" /> <Label fx:id="lblTongTienTraLai" layoutX="209.0" layoutY="149.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="190.0" text="Thuế (VAT):" /> <Label fx:id="lblVAT" layoutX="209.0" layoutY="189.0" styleClass="value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="240.0" styleClass="bold-label" text="Số tiền trả lại:" /> <Label fx:id="lblSoTienTraLai" layoutX="209.0" layoutY="239.0" styleClass="main-value-label" text="0 VNĐ" />
<Label layoutX="30.0" layoutY="290.0" text="Ghi chú:" /> <TextArea fx:id="txtGhiChu" layoutX="100.0" layoutY="285.0" prefHeight="120.0" prefWidth="225.0" />
<Button fx:id="btnDatHang" layoutX="61.0" layoutY="469.0" prefHeight="44.0" prefWidth="120.0" styleClass="danger-btn" text="In phiếu trả"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font></Button> <Button fx:id="btnThanhToan" layoutX="211.0" layoutY="469.0" prefHeight="44.0" prefWidth="120.0" styleClass="success-btn" text="Trả hàng"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font></Button> </children> </Pane> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent

<Button fx:id="btnDatHang" layoutX="61.0" layoutY="469.0" prefHeight="44.0" prefWidth="120.0" styleClass="print-btn" text="In phiếu trả"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font></Button> <Button fx:id="btnThanhToan" layoutX="211.0" layoutY="469.0" prefHeight="44.0" prefWidth="120.0" styleClass="success-btn" text="Trả hàng"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font></Button> </children> </Pane> </children> </AnchorPane>
